channel.title: Game does not close properly when I exit game
channel.description:
#### What happened?
Nearly every time I quit the game, it still shows the game is running in my Steam library. I have to quit steam, wait for it to try and close Throne of lies, then force close it.
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen?
Game should just exit, and steam should know its exited.
#### Steps to reproduce:
1. Open Steam 2. Run ToL from the Library menu 3. Exit game
#### Comments:
I can jump on discord if necessary to help debug.
